problems.title: Binary Subarrays With Sum (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given a binary array nums and an integer goal, return the number of non-empty subarrays with a sum equal to goal.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and goal.
Second line: n space-separated integers (0s and 1s).

Output Format:
Print the number of subarrays.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
